footer.address: 3C Ton Duc Thang Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh, VIETNAM

box-1.sub-title-text: With the latest technology and high-quality human resources, INOTEK always strives to bring customers the best quality products and services at low prices.

box-2.sub-title-text: With our multi-disciplinary expertise and the ability to constantly keep up with the latest technologies, we are always ready to support our customers on the path of developing business in various kinds of fields.

item-1.title: Web Application
item-1.subtitle: Building a professional web application not only increases the credibility of the business but also optimizes the customer experience.

item-2.title: Mobile Application
item-2.subtitle: Operate and develop your business efficiently with mobile application that integrates smart features and an eye-catching interface.

item-3.title: E-learning
item-3.subtitle: Automating, systematizing data allows users to self-register and manage learning. Provide various lectures thanks to an extensive network of connections.

item-4.title: E-commerce
item-4.subtitle: Replacing traditional business models with E-commerce helps businesses create competitive advantages, increase conversion rates and sales.

item-5.title: HR system
item-5.subtitle: Supports human resource management with outstanding features such as checking attendance, timekeeping, employee record keeping, periodic capacity assessment.

item-6.title: Accounting system
item-6.subtitle: Assist enterprises in managing employee compensation, financial situation, and operating expenses effectively.

item-7.title: DevOps
item-7.subtitle: Create a coherent working process between the developing department and the operation department to ensure product quality and project completion time.​

item-8.title: Consulting
item-8.subtitle: We consult, guide how to build, run software systems and transfer technology based on customer requests.

item-1.title: Cost savings
item-1.subtitle: Understanding budget concerns, INOTEK provides services at an affordable price, simultaneously, still ensuring the quality and progress of the project.

item-2.title: Creative solutions
item-2.subtitle: In order to support our customers in developing and expanding business, we always try our best to create the most innovative solutions.

item-3.title: Information security
item-3.subtitle: INOTEK always puts the information security for customers first, because not only provide services, we also want to build absolute trust and assurance.

item-4.title: High-quality team
item-4.subtitle: INOTEK has the best and most enthusiastic team of young engineers with multidisciplinary expertise to be able to offer superior technology.

box.title-text: Get advice and cooperate with us
box.highlight: Get advice and cooperate with us
box.sub-title-text: We are ready to consult as well as answer all of your questions in detail to support and develop your business in the best way.

vision.title: Affirming Vietnam's position on the world technology map
vision.highlight: Affirming Vietnam's position on the world technology map
vision.subtitle: With the vision of becoming a pioneering enterprise in the field of innovation and technology transfer, INOTEK was launched with the goal of connecting trade between domestic and foreign technology. Especially in developed countries like Japan, USA and Australia.

intro-text.text: INOTEK provides services to enterprises that are looking for modern technology solutions and high-quality engineers at low cost.

item1.title: PRODUCTION
item1.sub-title: Constructs and operates software technology platforms.
item1.content-text: Consulting, operating, maintaining, and optimizing the software systems for our clients.

item2.title: OUTSOURCING
item2.sub-title: Consulting, operating, maintaining, and optimizing the software systems for our clients.
item2.content-text: TOKUNABI - A job-search app for Vietnamese in Japan of TORENTA company.

intro-text.text: Various ranges of comprehensive products and services, including consulting about technology, business, and software engineering.

process.title: WHAT WE DO
process.content: We consult, build, optimize and run innovative software systems based on customer requirements.

product-and-service.title: PRODUCTS & SERVICES
product-and-service.content: With the latest technology solutions, we aim for a prosperous world in the future where everyone can connect and get things done easily.

card1.title: PRODUCTION
card1.content: Build and run creative technology platforms.​With smart features and a captivating interface, we want to build a friendly interactive environment that enhances user experience.
card1.img-text1: ​KAWME – An education technology platform that provide online courses to users.
card1.img-text2: Friends – A social networking platform for students.​

card2.title: OUTSOURCING
card2.content: Consulting, building, optimizing, and running innovative software systems to assist customers in solving problems as well as promoting the development of company scale.
card2.img-text1: Tokunabi - A job-search app of TORENTA company.
card2.img-text2: Personnel management app and information website of Vo Group company.

item1.title: CONSULT
item1.text: Based on the industry of customers company, INOTEK will consult and guide how to develop software projects appropriately.

item2.title: Build
item2.text: After that, we will proceed to build a website system, mobile application, and management system according to customers' requirements.

item3.title: RUN
item3.text: Finally, we carry out the operation and maintenance process of the completed software system for customers.

item4.title: OPTIMIZE​
item4.text: When the building step is done, INOTEK will support customers in optimizing to ensure that the software system will be deployed in the best way.

client-story.title: ĐÁNH GIÁ TỪ KHÁCH HÀNG

messages.page-intro: INOTEK concentrates on outsourcing and developing innovative software systems based on the most modern technologies with a team of high-quality engineers.

item1.title: OUR MISSION
item1.text: We offer the most modern technology solutions while ensuring optimal operating costs, deployment time, as well as product quality.

item2.title: OUR VALUES
item2.text: Provide products and services based on 4 criteria: MIND, CREATIVITY, WISDOM, SPEED.

item3.title: OUR VISION
item3.text: To become a pioneering enterprise in the innovation field and technology transfer between countries around the world.

our-projects.intro-text: We have been developing optimal projects for businesses in terms of constructing technology platforms, design consulting, operating, and maintaining software systems. Simultaneously, supporting high-quality human resources to save budget.
